name: Honeylove
headline: Honeylove makes functional undergarments for women
description: Honeylove is a DTC startup founded by EDM artist Betsie Larkin. After searching high and low for quality shapewear that made her feel confident on stage, Betsie decided to create her own line of stage-worthy shapewear and launched publicly in 2018. Since then, Honeylove has expanded to tops, bras, and many other garments that have set new standards in their verticals. We apply a technical and artistic approach to problems we see in the fashion industry, creating products that serve our customers of all shapes, sizes, and backgrounds.

generated_description:
Honeylove is a forward-thinking DTC (direct-to-consumer) startup specializing in functional shapewear and undergarments for women. Founded in 2018 by EDM artist Betsie Larkin, who sought confidence-boosting shapewear for her performances, the company has swiftly evolved to offer a diverse range of products, including tops, bras, and other garments. The core mission here is to blend technical innovation with artistic design to create clothing that embraces women of all shapes, sizes, and backgrounds.

Operating out of Los Angeles, California, Honeylove is a spirited team of 100 employees and has even gained traction through Y Combinator's Batch S18. Influenced by a genuine passion for better fitting and stylish undergarments, Honeylove aims to set a new standard in the fashion industry—a worthier goal than simple profit margins.

The company’s offerings are not only focused on aesthetics but are designed with performance in mind, ensuring customers feel supported and confident no matter their activities. Whether you're looking for shapewear that sculpts and shapes or a comfy yet stylish bra, Honeylove has got you covered.

Honeylove stands out with a commitment to inclusivity and quality. Each piece is rigorously tested, reflecting real-world needs of women who refuse to compromise on fit or comfort. With a motto of "Where function meets fashion," Honeylove aligns its vision with modern sensibilities, catering to the diverse tastes and needs of its audience.

For more information or to browse their unique lineup, you can visit their website at [honeylove.com](https://www.honeylove.com).
